column4: Ok, my Flash sound on youtube , etc is totally broken...I am all out of answers, i really need help
reinstall flashplugin-nonfree and flashplugin-installer from synaptic
can you tell me how to properly uninstall all flash and do that?
reinstalling a package will automatically uninstall it and then reinstall it freshly
open synaptic and find the packages flashplugin-nonfree and flashplugin-installer, then right click on them an select reinstall
ok
still no go :\
reinstalled?
what browser are u using?
mozilla firefox
restart browser
i did
try with the deb package from adobe site
im telling you i have tried just about everything
then u dont have it installed
i installed it in synaptic
if you installed in synaptic then sudo apt-get remove flashplugin-nonfree should remove it
ok remmoved it
now try the deb from adobe site
still nogo
ok then i dunno :|
how do i upgrade my ubuntu to the new one?
